_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: discord-python-bot
author: panel@2b2tmcpe.org
description: This is an egg for running discord bot coded using discord.py with a template bot.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apk add --no-cache git gcc g++ libffi-dev make build-base

cd /mnt/server

echo "Cloning pixel-bot repo"
git clone https://github.com/maxxie114/disord-python-bot-template.git .

echo "Installing python requirements into folder"
pip install -U --target $(pwd) -r requirements.txt

variables.name: bot token
variables.description: Put the token for the discord bot here

variables.name: bot prefix
variables.description: Put the prefix of the bot here
